name: Kill Me
description:
Kill Me is a platformer following Plateface. A regular joe who has no friends decides life is not for him, he tries to kill himself but ends up being taken for a very strange ride.

The arcade mode (unlimited runner) sees Plateface running wildly through his unconscious mind where he doesn't know who is friend or foe.

Story mode will see Plateface on a mission to discover, make and save his friends.

KIll Me Instructions and Rules

Spacebar - Jump

Right Click - Slide and Air Attack

C - Sit

Left Click- Laser

Laser uses energy
Air attack uses no energy but you must have at least one energy to use it.
Slide requires no energy to use it but uses one energy if you hit a letter
